definition: strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort

sentences.english: Roxanne And that was against some tough defenders .
sentences.chinese: 萝珊那可是面对对方强悍防守球员的成绩。

sentences.english: You're going to need to be tough in general, sometimes downright ruthless.
sentences.chinese: 你需要很强悍，有些时候甚至要残酷无情。

sentences.english: We worked in an almost exclusively, indeed aggressively, masculine environment.
sentences.chinese: 我们所工作的环境中几乎只有强悍的大老爷们。

sentences.english: Voice search is also great when it comes to your local business listings.
sentences.chinese: 在搜索本地企业名单时，音频搜索也表现得同样强悍。

sentences.english: This was, as expected, a game with some strong challenges and lots of set-pieces.
sentences.chinese: 不出所料，这是一场对抗强悍和定位球频现的比赛。

sentences.english: Those women are far from being Amazon types.
sentences.chinese: 那些女人远不像亚马孙族般强悍刚勇。

sentences.english: Would you rather defend against a burly forward or a forward like Chicharito?
sentences.chinese: 你更喜欢防守赫尔南德斯还是一个强悍的前锋？

sentences.english: Woomin is rough and tough . But he is human.
sentences.chinese: 宇民是粗野和强悍的，但他却是人性的。

sentences.english: However, our little three or even more than genuine tough woman.
sentences.chinese: 但她这个小三，比正牌女人还要强悍。

sentences.english: But Deke, particularly, he has shown me what it tough.
sentences.chinese: 但是，木大叔的表现的确告诉了我什么才是坚韧强悍。
写作者怎样才能写得更“强悍”？

sentences.english: The sweat blood treasure horse, the lance shake hands, the helmet is shining, I am puffed up with pride and violent.
sentences.chinese: 汗血宝马，长剑握手，盔甲闪亮，我踌躇满志而强悍。

sentences.english: Ex. Sue has so strong personality that few people can stand her.
sentences.chinese: 苏的个性太强悍以至于很少有人能和她合得来。

sentences.english: After a sudden storm, the searing sun turned much tender.
sentences.chinese: 一场强悍的暴雨，让烈阳温柔了许多。

sentences.english: We toughed it out and made things happen at the end.
sentences.chinese: 我们打得更强悍，让一切在最后改变。

sentences.english: A nomadic desert people, Bedouin are hardy but unruly troops.
sentences.chinese: 贝督因为沙漠游牧部落，其部民强悍桀骜。

definition: eager to excel/eager to get ahead in life/strong-minded
